1   package test.net.sourceforge.pmd.cpd;
2   
3   import static org.junit.Assert.assertEquals;
4   import net.sourceforge.pmd.cpd.TokenEntry;
5   
6   import org.junit.Test;
7   
8   public class TokenEntryTest  {
9   
10      @Test
11      public void testSimple() {
12          TokenEntry.clearImages();
13          TokenEntry mark = new TokenEntry("public", "/var/Foo.java", 1);
14          assertEquals(1, mark.getBeginLine());
15          assertEquals("/var/Foo.java", mark.getTokenSrcID());
16          assertEquals(0, mark.getIndex());
17      }
18  
19      public static junit.framework.Test suite() {
20          return new junit.framework.JUnit4TestAdapter(TokenEntryTest.class);
21      }
